title: 1880년 Watson 사건
summary: 미국 Michigan, MI 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Watson. 판결일: 1880-10-27. 법원: Michigan Supreme Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: WATSON v. RANDALL (Circuit Court Commissioner)
**판결일**: 1880-10-27
**법원**: Michigan Supreme Court
**관할**: Michigan, MI

## 인용

- 1 McGrath 765
- 44 McGrath 514

## 판결문 요약


To compel respondent to issue an execution for costs taxed by him in proceedings under the fraudulent debtors’ act.
Granted October 27, 1880.
...
